about.title: About Me
text: I’m a web developer with a degree in Information Systems from the Federal University of Pará. Since writing my first lines of code, I discovered that technology is much more than just tools and programming languages, it’s a way to turn ideas into real solutions. I am driven by challenges and by the joy of building digital products that make people’s lives easier. I believe that good software goes beyond clean code: it must deliver value, provide a great user experience, and generate tangible results for those who use it.

In my daily work, I strive to combine technical skill, creativity, and empathy. I have a strong focus on both the client and the end user, always seeking to understand their pain points and turn those needs into efficient and scalable solutions. I am proactive, focused, and dedicated in everything I do. I love programming, learning new technologies, and diving deep into complex problems until I find the best solution. To me, every project is an opportunity to grow, both as a professional and as a person.
